title: Mr Koumal carries the torch
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Studio Animovaneho Filmu and Sim Productions
brief_description: Mr Koumal is determined to carry a torch to its destination. He runs on and on, braving many obstacles; nothing can deter him from pursuing his task. Just when he comes within a few steps of the finishing line, a bystander trips him up, crosses the line with the torch, and wins all the glory. Animated film. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
